companySalaries.whatAreCareerLevels: What are the career levels at
companySalaries.levelsTooltip: Levels codify the hierarchy, scope & responsibility of employees in a company. Those at the first level (ex. Entry Level) are typically employees with the least industry experience. Companies decide pay bands for each level - our data exposes these ranges for you.

vestMessage.averageTotalCompensationCalculated: the average total compensation is calculated by dividing the total stock grant evenly by 4
vestMessage.alsoAverageSignOnBonuses: . We also average out the sum of the sign on bonuses over 4 years to calculate the total bonus.

company.name: Broadcom
company.description: Broadcom Inc. is an American designer, developer, manufacturer and global supplier of a wide range of semiconductor and infrastructure software products.
company.hq_address: 1320 Ridder Park Dr, San Jose, CA 95131, USA
company.vesting_detail: Broadcom provides multi-year stock grants, ensuring refreshers for both the current and following year. These grants vest in equal portions as shown in the graphs above. The value of these grants can vary annually based on stock performance.
company.aliases: Symantec, CA Technologies, Terma Software Labs

samples.title: Software Engineer

generatedOccupationSchema.name: Software Engineer
generatedOccupationSchema.description: Designs and develops software products for a company

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the highest Software Engineer salary at Broadcom in United States?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The highest paying salary package reported for a Software Engineer at Broadcom in United States sits at a yearly total compensation of $740,440. This includes base salary as well as any potential stock compensation and bonuses.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How much do Broadcom Software Engineer employees get paid in United States?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The median yearly total compensation reported at Broadcom for the Software Engineer role in United States is $283,000.
